### Problem

<p>All <svg width="2.064ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 888.5 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E1-MJMATHI-4E" d="M234 637Q231 637 226 637Q201 637 196 638T191 649Q191 676 202 682Q204 683 299 683Q376 683 387 683T401 677Q612 181 616 168L670 381Q723 592 723 606Q723 633 659 637Q635 637 635 648Q635 650 637 660Q641 676 643 679T653 683Q656 683 684 682T767 680Q817 680 843 681T873 682Q888 682 888 672Q888 650 880 642Q878 637 858 637Q787 633 769 597L620 7Q618 0 599 0Q585 0 582 2Q579 5 453 305L326 604L261 344Q196 88 196 79Q201 46 268 46H278Q284 41 284 38T282 19Q278 6 272 0H259Q228 2 151 2Q123 2 100 2T63 2T46 1Q31 1 31 10Q31 14 34 26T39 40Q41 46 62 46Q130 49 150 85Q154 91 221 362L289 634Q287 635 234 637Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E1-MJMATHI-4E" x="0" y="0"></use></g></svg> students of a class are standing on a straight line behind one other student. For example, student 2 is standing behind student 1, student 3 is standing behind student 2, and so on until the <svg width="3.896ex" height="2.409ex" viewBox="0 -920.5 1677.3 1037.3" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E2-MJMATHI-4E" d="M234 637Q231 637 226 637Q201 637 196 638T191 649Q191 676 202 682Q204 683 299 683Q376 683 387 683T401 677Q612 181 616 168L670 381Q723 592 723 606Q723 633 659 637Q635 637 635 648Q635 650 637 660Q641 676 643 679T653 683Q656 683 684 682T767 680Q817 680 843 681T873 682Q888 682 888 672Q888 650 880 642Q878 637 858 637Q787 633 769 597L620 7Q618 0 599 0Q585 0 582 2Q579 5 453 305L326 604L261 344Q196 88 196 79Q201 46 268 46H278Q284 41 284 38T282 19Q278 6 272 0H259Q228 2 151 2Q123 2 100 2T63 2T46 1Q31 1 31 10Q31 14 34 26T39 40Q41 46 62 46Q130 49 150 85Q154 91 221 362L289 634Q287 635 234 637Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E2-MJMATHI-74" d="M26 385Q19 392 19 395Q19 399 22 411T27 425Q29 430 36 430T87 431H140L159 511Q162 522 166 540T173 566T179 586T187 603T197 615T211 624T229 626Q247 625 254 615T261 596Q261 589 252 549T232 470L222 433Q222 431 272 431H323Q330 424 330 420Q330 398 317 385H210L174 240Q135 80 135 68Q135 26 162 26Q197 26 230 60T283 144Q285 150 288 151T303 153H307Q322 153 322 145Q322 142 319 133Q314 117 301 95T267 48T216 6T155 -11Q125 -11 98 4T59 56Q57 64 57 83V101L92 241Q127 382 128 383Q128 385 77 385H26Z"></path><path stroke-width="1" id="E2-MJMATHI-68" d="M137 683Q138 683 209 688T282 694Q294 694 294 685Q294 674 258 534Q220 386 220 383Q220 381 227 388Q288 442 357 442Q411 442 444 415T478 336Q478 285 440 178T402 50Q403 36 407 31T422 26Q450 26 474 56T513 138Q516 149 519 151T535 153Q555 153 555 145Q555 144 551 130Q535 71 500 33Q466 -10 419 -10H414Q367 -10 346 17T325 74Q325 90 361 192T398 345Q398 404 354 404H349Q266 404 205 306L198 293L164 158Q132 28 127 16Q114 -11 83 -11Q69 -11 59 -2T48 16Q48 30 121 320L195 616Q195 629 188 632T149 637H128Q122 643 122 645T124 664Q129 683 137 683Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E2-MJMATHI-4E" x="0" y="0"></use><g transform="translate(914,362)"><use transform="scale(0.707)" xlink:href="#E2-MJMATHI-74" x="0" y="0"></use><use transform="scale(0.707)" xlink:href="#E2-MJMATHI-68" x="361" y="0"></use></g></g></svg> student.<br>
The happiness level of a student is determined by the number of students standing before him whose height is strictly greater than him. The total happiness of the class is the sum of the happiness level of all students.<br>
Now you can help minimize this sadness. Your task is to minimize the happiness level of the class.<br>
Note: You can select one student from anywhere in the line and place him at the end of the line.</p>
<p><strong>Input format</strong></p>
<ul>
	<li>First line: An integer <svg width="1.636ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 704.5 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E3-MJMATHI-54" d="M40 437Q21 437 21 445Q21 450 37 501T71 602L88 651Q93 669 101 677H569H659Q691 677 697 676T704 667Q704 661 687 553T668 444Q668 437 649 437Q640 437 637 437T631 442L629 445Q629 451 635 490T641 551Q641 586 628 604T573 629Q568 630 515 631Q469 631 457 630T439 622Q438 621 368 343T298 60Q298 48 386 46Q418 46 427 45T436 36Q436 31 433 22Q429 4 424 1L422 0Q419 0 415 0Q410 0 363 1T228 2Q99 2 64 0H49Q43 6 43 9T45 27Q49 40 55 46H83H94Q174 46 189 55Q190 56 191 56Q196 59 201 76T241 233Q258 301 269 344Q339 619 339 625Q339 630 310 630H279Q212 630 191 624Q146 614 121 583T67 467Q60 445 57 441T43 437H40Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E3-MJMATHI-54" x="0" y="0"></use></g></svg> denoting the number of test cases</li>
	<li>For each test case:
	<ul>
		<li>First line: An integer <svg width="2.064ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 888.5 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E4-MJMATHI-4E" d="M234 637Q231 637 226 637Q201 637 196 638T191 649Q191 676 202 682Q204 683 299 683Q376 683 387 683T401 677Q612 181 616 168L670 381Q723 592 723 606Q723 633 659 637Q635 637 635 648Q635 650 637 660Q641 676 643 679T653 683Q656 683 684 682T767 680Q817 680 843 681T873 682Q888 682 888 672Q888 650 880 642Q878 637 858 637Q787 633 769 597L620 7Q618 0 599 0Q585 0 582 2Q579 5 453 305L326 604L261 344Q196 88 196 79Q201 46 268 46H278Q284 41 284 38T282 19Q278 6 272 0H259Q228 2 151 2Q123 2 100 2T63 2T46 1Q31 1 31 10Q31 14 34 26T39 40Q41 46 62 46Q130 49 150 85Q154 91 221 362L289 634Q287 635 234 637Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E4-MJMATHI-4E" x="0" y="0"></use></g></svg> denoting the number of students in a class</li>
		<li>Next line: <svg width="2.064ex" height="2.009ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 888.5 865.1" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -0.271ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E5-MJMATHI-4E" d="M234 637Q231 637 226 637Q201 637 196 638T191 649Q191 676 202 682Q204 683 299 683Q376 683 387 683T401 677Q612 181 616 168L670 381Q723 592 723 606Q723 633 659 637Q635 637 635 648Q635 650 637 660Q641 676 643 679T653 683Q656 683 684 682T767 680Q817 680 843 681T873 682Q888 682 888 672Q888 650 880 642Q878 637 858 637Q787 633 769 597L620 7Q618 0 599 0Q585 0 582 2Q579 5 453 305L326 604L261 344Q196 88 196 79Q201 46 268 46H278Q284 41 284 38T282 19Q278 6 272 0H259Q228 2 151 2Q123 2 100 2T63 2T46 1Q31 1 31 10Q31 14 34 26T39 40Q41 46 62 46Q130 49 150 85Q154 91 221 362L289 634Q287 635 234 637Z"></path></defs><g stroke="currentColor" fill="currentColor" stroke-width="0" transform="matrix(1 0 0 -1 0 0)"><use xlink:href="#E5-MJMATHI-4E" x="0" y="0"></use></g></svg> space-separated integers denoting the height of each student</li>
	</ul>
	</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Output format</strong><br>
For each test case, print the minimum total happiness that can be achived.</p>
<p><strong>Constraints</strong><br>
<svg width="18.08ex" height="9.076ex" viewBox="0 -748.3 7784.4 3907.7" role="img" focusable="false" style="vertical-align: -7.338ex;" aria-hidden="true"><defs><path stroke-width="1" id="E6-MJMAIN-31" <table>
    <thead>
        <th>Sample Input</th>
        <th>Sample Output</th>
    </thead>
    <tbody valign="top">
        <td>1<br>4<br>4 1 3 2</td>
        <td>1</td>
    </tbody>
</table>
<p>Time Limit: 1<br>
Memory Limit: 256<br>
Source Limit:</p>

### Explanation

<p>Place the first student at end of line<br>
so the new line becomes<br>
1 3 2 4<br>
<br>
clearly total sadness level = ( 0 + 0 + 1 + 0 ) = 1 .</p>
